feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Development
feed.subtitle: ABAP Development Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: IW36: Copying Settlement Rules in the Child Order
entry.content:
Hi,

Is it possible in the IW36 transaction, when launched by a BDC (Batch Data Communication), to copy the settlement rules from the superior order into the child order at the point when the child order hasn't been created yet? This would be done from the IF_EX_WORKORDER_UPDATE~AT_SAVE method of the BADI.

Thank you.

entry.title: Accrual object creation --mass upload program
entry.content: I have developed an ABAP program to create accrual objects. The objects are visible in transaction ACACTREE02, but the Value field is empty. How can I make the values appear in ACACTREE02 after creating the objects?

entry.title: Vendor Basic details are not showing in FBL1N (List Display) transaction
entry.content:
Hello, 

We have upgraded our SAP support package(ECC SP Level-0031) recently, After upgrade we are facing an issue in FBL1N transaction. 

Before upgrade in FBL1N transaction vendor Basic details like Vendor Account number, Company code, Name and city are showing on Top of vendor items as mentioned in screenshot (screenshot attached) whereas after upgrade vendor details are not showing (screenshot attached).

The issue is occurring only in LIST OUTPUT whereas in GRID OUTPUT it is working correctly. Someone please help to find the root cause (any configuration or development to be done).

entry.content: I have some mismatched entries in VBFA table where I wanted to update RFMNG_FLO field based on RFMNG. What can be a better approach of doing it?

entry.title: How to find the segment i need to map in IDOC if I have the specific field name?

entry.title: How to determine the bopf action inside a badi implementation?
entry.content:
Hi everybody,
In our dev, we create the service PO based on the freight settlement document.
Inside, we have a badi implementation. We want this implementation to be executed only during this service PO creation.
In other words, if this badi is called during any other process we want it not to be executed.

In order to do this i need to get the bopf action key which i can see in callstack and use it as a filter for the execution of the badi via hardcoding. How can i get the action key here?

Regards

entry.title: Future of Feature Toggles
entry.content:
Dear all, 

I am currently member in a migration project to S4 Hana.
We currently use a self-developed framework that also has a "feature toggle" functionality.

When I looked into the topic of feature toggles a few years ago, I discovered that SAP has an own implementation of feature toggles in S4.

Now I wanted to test this and the result is:

  • Legacy feature toggles are marked as deprecated in Eclipse.
  • Switch-Based Feature Toggles cannot be created on customer systems.

What is the future here in on premise / private cloud?

The idea of a feature toggle is a temporary switch. As soon as the feature has been fully developed and rolled out to all users, it should be removed.
Therefore, in my opinion, there is nothing to be said against the usage of "legacy feature toggles", as they are meant only to be used temporarily in the code.

In case the framework is deleted by SAP, the legacy feature toggles should have been removed and deleted again following the idea of clean code.

At least I do not find "cl_feature_toggle"  in the current simplification database :-).

What's your opinion?
Is there a better alternative?

Regards
Jürgen

entry.title: SAP BAPI_LISTING_CONDITIONS
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have a problem with this bapi, I'll explain more about my problem. I need to create a  a program Z to modify Rebate Agreements massive are in SAP, loading a excel with the fields that want to change.  With the technical specifications detailed by the functional team, this operation is carried out by transaction VBO2. In this transaction you put the agreement number(KONA-KNUMA) and check the existing conditions of this agreement number:

But the question is: Is there any procedure to extract these conditions through SAP master tables or, failing that, a BAPI that shows me the same transaction information using the agreement number?.

Can anyone help me with this problem?.

Thanks

entry.title: VL02N - Delivery Output ->Header Update using RV_MESSAGE_INSERT
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am trying update NAST for VL02N after PGI to add Delivery Output->Header to add additional Output type using ABAP.

I have added the code in program MV50AFZ1 Userexit- USEREXIT_SAVE_DOCUMENT_PREPARE.

 DATA: ls_nast   TYPE nast,
        lt_nast   TYPE TABLE OF nast,
        lv_exists TYPE abap_bool.
  TABLES : nast.
  CLEAR lv_exists.
  SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM nast
    WHERE kappl = 'V2'
      AND objky = likp-vbeln
    AND  kschl = 'ZGR1'   AND parvw = 'SP'
    AND parnr = likp-kunnr
    AND spras = 'ZH'
    .
   IF SY-SUBRC NE 0.
     LV_EXISTS = ABAP_FALSE.
   ENDIF.

    IF vbuk-wbstk ='C'.
      IF lv_exists = abap_false.
        CLEAR ls_nast.
        ls_nast-mandt = sy-mandt.
        ls_nast-kappl = 'V2'.
        ls_nast-objky = likp-vbeln.
        ls_nast-kschl = 'XYZ1'.
        ls_nast-parvw = 'SP'.
        ls_nast-parnr = likp-kunnr.
        ls_nast-spras = 'ZH'.
        ls_nast-nacha = '8'.
        ls_nast-vsztp = '4'.
        ls_nast-anzal = '1'.
        ls_nast-erdat = sy-datum.
        ls_nast-uhrvr = sy-uzeit.
        ls_nast-usnam = sy-uname.

        APPEND ls_nast TO lt_nast.
  CALL FUNCTION 'RV_MESSAGES_INSERT'
    TABLES
      tab_xnast = lt_nast.
  CALL FUNCTION 'RV_MESSAGES_UPDATE'
      EXPORTING
         msg_objky = ls_nast-objky.

   COMMIT WORK.
    ENDIF.
 ENDIF.

 XYZ1 is getting added in Delivery Output but existing output is also getting added again.
Can you please help me on this issue.

Thanks

entry.title: Is there a S/4HANA cloud test/demo/development system for partners including sample data like IDES?
entry.content:
Hi folks,

This might be a noob question, but I cannot find an answer to it on the web and reaching out to SAP about only gives me e-mail after e-mail of links that I already found myself and that do not answer my question. So, maybe the community can help!?

Here is what I am looking for: we want to get access to a cloud based SAP ERP environment that allows us to develop a ABAP report and create a transport for it (SE38, SE93, SE10, SE80, STMS, ...). To be able to develop and test the program, the system needs to be prefilled with a "meaningful" amount of data in the MM and PP area, such as material master data, business partner master data, BOMs, sales orders, invoices, purchase orders, and so on. I do not have time to create all that data in a substantial amount myself. And we do not have a SAP system for migration or a data set that we could import. I formerly had access to an on-prem R/3 installation with the IDES (internet demonstration and evaluation system) data. Basically, we are looking for something similar, but a cloud-based offering with development rights. 2 or 3 named users would be sufficient. 

So the question is, is there such an offer by SAP and if so, where can I find it. Ohh, btw, we are SAP partners, so this can also be a partner offering.

Thank you
Thomas

entry.title: Method abcd__GET_ENTITYSET is not implemented- Calling RFC FM
entry.content:
Hi ,

I am calling a RFC function module in my gateway project. My RFC Fm returns just one line of data (XML String ) in an export parameter.

I Created data model by import->RFC and in the service implementation getEntity I did Map to data Source.

Now When I execute my request

/sap/opu/odata/sap/ZSD_XXXX_XXXX_READ_SRV/InputParamSet?$format=json

 

I get 501 error saying " "value" : "Method 'INPUTPARAMSET_GET_ENTITYSET' not implemented in data provider class"

entry.title: Upload Program to Update Equipment Status in IE02 – Inconsistent Results with SHDB
entry.content:
Hello Community,

I'm working on an upload program to update the Equipment Status in transaction IE02. I initially used SHDB (Transaction Recorder) to record the update process, and while it works in some cases, it's inconsistent — sometimes the status updates successfully, and other times it doesn't.

Has anyone faced similar issues with SHDB when updating equipment status in IE02? Is there a more reliable method (BAPI, function module, or any other approach) to perform this update via a program?

I'm attaching a screenshot for reference. Any guidance or best practices would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

Thanks!

entry.title: DMEE XML File truncated after S/4HANA 2023 upgrade
entry.content:
Hi All,

We recently upgraded our system from S/4HANA 2021 to 2023.

We are noticing an issue with XML export in the FDTA transaction. When we try to download a new run, the generated XML file is truncated. Format DE_CGI_XML_CT.

For older runs (generated before the upgrade), the XML files are generated correctly also if we try to download it now.

Ca you help us, please?

Thank You

Best Regards

Alessandro

entry.title: OData Service — Data Retrieved in Debug, but HTTP 500 Error After Execution
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am developing an OData service to retrieve Sales Order header and item data.

What I did:

Imported a DDIC structure into my MPC.

Implemented the logic in GET_ENTITY and GET_ENTITYSET methods.

When I test the service in /IWFND/MAINT_SERVICE or the browser, the data appears correctly during debugging.

The issue:
After I press F8 to let the request finish, I get an HTTP 500 error with the message:
In the context of Data Services an unknown internal server error occurred.
Transaction ID: 08BBE93FEEFF0010E006884DDA300316
Timestamp: 2025-08-15 06:29:14
Suggestion: Run /IWFND/ERROR_LOG as per SAP Note 1797736

My question:
Why does this happen only after execution, even though the data is retrieved correctly in debug mode?
Could this be due to metadata type mismatch or another common OData serialization issue?

Thank you in advance for your guidance
Ashok

entry.title: Fiori Tile Perform foreign currency valuation is not updating Business area field
entry.content:
I am trying to populate business area (GSBER)value in line items.

Used Substitution but bseg entry is not created so substitution not called.

Implemented Badi AC_Documrnt that is called and in debug mode values are changed in exporting field.But when I see the document posted values are not populated in Acdoca record. Also fb03 that GSBER value is not reflecting.

Any solution how to substitute/ Change business area 

Thanks
